@package japanese-calendar
@version 0.1.0.0

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Internal.DataUtils
enumToName :: Enum a => [String] -> a -> String
enumFromName :: Enum a => [String] -> String -> Maybe a

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Internal.AstroUtils

-- | converts a UTC time a Julian century.
julianCenturyFromUTCTime :: UTCTime -> Double

-- | converts a Julian century a UTC time.
utcTimeFromJulianCentury :: Double -> UTCTime

-- | solves an equation <tt>f x = y</tt>, in case <tt>f</tt> has a similar
--   form to a sawtooth.
solveSawtooth :: Double -> Double -> (Double -> Double) -> Int -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Internal.Sun

-- | calculates ecliptic longitude of the sun in degrees from a UTC time.
sunEclipticLongitude :: UTCTime -> Double

-- | estimates the nearest day when the sun's ecliptic longitude is the
--   given value.
sunEclipticLongitudeToTime :: Double -> UTCTime -> UTCTime

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Internal.Moon

-- | calculates ecliptic longitude of the moon in degrees from a UTC time.
moonEclipticLongitude :: UTCTime -> Double

-- | calculates the moon phase in degrees from a UTC time.
moonPhase :: UTCTime -> Double

-- | estimates the nearest day of new moon.
nearestNewMoon :: UTCTime -> UTCTime

-- | the average cycle of the moon phase.
averageMoonPhaseCycle :: Fractional a => a

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.SolarTerm

-- | the twenty-four solar terms
data SolarTerm

-- | 春分
VernalEquinox :: SolarTerm

-- | 清明
ClearAndBright :: SolarTerm

-- | 穀雨
GrainRain :: SolarTerm

-- | 立夏
StartOfSummer :: SolarTerm

-- | 小満
GrainFull :: SolarTerm

-- | 芒種
GrainInEar :: SolarTerm

-- | 夏至
SummerSolstice :: SolarTerm

-- | 小暑
MinorHeat :: SolarTerm

-- | 大暑
MajorHeat :: SolarTerm

-- | 立秋
StartOfAutumn :: SolarTerm

-- | 処暑
LimitOfHeat :: SolarTerm

-- | 白露
WhiteDew :: SolarTerm

-- | 秋分
AutumnalEquinox :: SolarTerm

-- | 寒露
ColdDew :: SolarTerm

-- | 霜降
FrostDescent :: SolarTerm

-- | 立冬
StartOfWinter :: SolarTerm

-- | 小雪
MinorSnow :: SolarTerm

-- | 大雪
MajorSnow :: SolarTerm

-- | 冬至
WinterSolstice :: SolarTerm

-- | 小寒
MinorCold :: SolarTerm

-- | 大寒
MajorCold :: SolarTerm

-- | 立春
StartOfSpring :: SolarTerm

-- | 雨水
RainWater :: SolarTerm

-- | 啓蟄
AwakeningOfInsects :: SolarTerm

-- | returns a Japanese name of a solar term
solarTermToJapaneseName :: SolarTerm -> String

-- | converts a Japanese name of a solar term into a SolarTerm
solarTermFromJapaneseName :: String -> Maybe SolarTerm

-- | tests whether the solar term is a segment point, sekki
isSegmentPoint :: SolarTerm -> Bool

-- | tests whether the solar term is a center point, chuki
isCenterPoint :: SolarTerm -> Bool

-- | returns a solar term of a specified day
solarTerm :: TimeZone -> Day -> Maybe SolarTerm

-- | finds the nearest solar term
nearestSolarTerm :: TimeZone -> Day -> (SolarTerm, Day)

-- | creates a list of solar terms starting with the nearest solar term
--   from a specified day
solarTermsFrom :: TimeZone -> Day -> [(SolarTerm, Day)]

-- | finds the nearest specified solar term
findNearestSolarTerm :: TimeZone -> SolarTerm -> Day -> Day
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.SolarTerm.SolarTerm
instance GHC.Enum.Bounded Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.SolarTerm.SolarTerm
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.SolarTerm.SolarTerm
instance GHC.Show.Show Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.SolarTerm.SolarTerm

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar

-- | a type of a month in the Tempo calendar
data TempoMonthType

-- | 睦月
Mutsuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 如月
Kisaragi :: TempoMonthType

-- | 弥生
Yayoi :: TempoMonthType

-- | 卯月
Uzuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 皐月
Satsuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 水無月
Minazuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 文月
Fumizuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 葉月
Hazuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 長月
Nagatsuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 神無月
Kannazuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 霜月
Shimotsuki :: TempoMonthType

-- | 師走
Shiwasu :: TempoMonthType

-- | a month in the Tempo calendar
data TempoMonth
CommonMonth :: TempoMonthType -> TempoMonth
[tempoMonthType] :: TempoMonth -> TempoMonthType
LeapMonth :: TempoMonthType -> TempoMonth
[tempoMonthType] :: TempoMonth -> TempoMonthType

-- | a date in the Tempo calendar
data TempoDate
TempoDate :: Integer -> TempoMonth -> Int -> TempoDate
[tempoYear] :: TempoDate -> Integer
[tempoMonth] :: TempoDate -> TempoMonth
[tempoDay] :: TempoDate -> Int

-- | gets the number of the month which starts from one
monthNumber :: TempoMonth -> Int

-- | tests whether a month is a leap month
isLeapMonth :: TempoMonth -> Bool

-- | returns a Japanese name of a month in the Tempo calendar
tempoMonthToJapaneseName :: TempoMonth -> String

-- | converts a Japanese name of a month in the Tempo calendar into a
--   TempoMonth
tempoMonthFromJapaneseName :: String -> Maybe TempoMonth

-- | the cyclic successor of TempoMonthType
nextTempoMonthType :: TempoMonthType -> TempoMonthType

-- | the cyclic predecessor of TempoMonthType
previousTempoMonthType :: TempoMonthType -> TempoMonthType

-- | converts a date into a date in the Tempo calendar
tempoDate :: TimeZone -> Day -> Maybe TempoDate
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoDate
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoDate
instance GHC.Show.Show Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoDate
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoMonth
instance GHC.Show.Show Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoMonth
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoMonthType
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoMonthType
instance GHC.Enum.Bounded Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoMonthType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoMonthType
instance GHC.Show.Show Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoMonthType
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.TempoCalendar.TempoMonth

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Rokuyo

-- | a rokuyo
data Rokuyo

-- | 先勝
Sensho :: Rokuyo

-- | 友引
Tomobiki :: Rokuyo

-- | 先負
Senbu :: Rokuyo

-- | 仏滅
Butsumetsu :: Rokuyo

-- | 大安
Taian :: Rokuyo

-- | 赤口
Shakko :: Rokuyo

-- | returns a Japanese name of a rokuyo
rokuyoToJapaneseName :: Rokuyo -> String

-- | converts a Japanese name of a rokuyo into a SolarTerm
rokuyoFromJapaneseName :: String -> Maybe Rokuyo

-- | calculates a rokuyo from a Tempo date
rokuyoFromTempoDate :: TempoDate -> Rokuyo

-- | calculates a rokuyo from a date
rokuyo :: TimeZone -> Day -> Maybe Rokuyo
instance GHC.Enum.Bounded Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Rokuyo.Rokuyo
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Rokuyo.Rokuyo
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Rokuyo.Rokuyo
instance GHC.Show.Show Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Rokuyo.Rokuyo

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar
jst :: TimeZone

module Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Holiday

-- | Japanese holidays
data HolidayType

-- | 元日
NewYearsDay :: HolidayType

-- | 成人の日
ComingOfAgeDay :: HolidayType

-- | 建国記念の日
FoundationDay :: HolidayType

-- | 春分の日
VernalEquinoxDay :: HolidayType

-- | 昭和の日
ShowaDay :: HolidayType

-- | 憲法記念日
ConstitutionMemorialDay :: HolidayType

-- | みどりの日
GreeneryDay :: HolidayType

-- | こどもの日
ChildrensDay :: HolidayType

-- | 海の日
MarineDay :: HolidayType

-- | 山の日
MountainDay :: HolidayType

-- | 敬老の日
RespectForTheAgedDay :: HolidayType

-- | 秋分の日
AutumnalEquinoxDay :: HolidayType

-- | 体育の日
HealthAndSportsDay :: HolidayType

-- | 文化の日
CultureDay :: HolidayType

-- | 勤労感謝の日
LabourThanksgivingDay :: HolidayType

-- | 天皇誕生日
TheEmperorsBirthday :: HolidayType

-- | 振替休日
TransferHoliday :: HolidayType

-- | 国民の休日
CitizensHoliday :: HolidayType

-- | returns a name of a holiday type
holidayName :: HolidayType -> String

-- | returns the holiday type of the specifed day
holidayType :: Day -> Maybe HolidayType
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Holiday.DayOfWeek
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Holiday.DayOfWeek
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Holiday.HolidayType
instance GHC.Show.Show Data.Time.JapaneseCalendar.Holiday.HolidayType
